content.title: Antiplatelet Resistance
content.description: Laboratory and clinical resistance to antiplatelet agents

key_concepts.details: 5-40% prevalence depending on definition; may reflect noncompliance, drug interactions, or true resistance
CYP2C19 polymorphisms affect metabolism; poor metabolizers have reduced response
Platelet function tests available (VerifyNow, vasodilator-stimulated phosphoprotein)
Routine testing not recommended; consider in recurrent events despite therapy

content.clinical_significance: May explain some treatment failures but routine testing not standard
